import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Grid, Tabs, TextField, Typography, Hidden} from '@material-ui/core' import {Link} from '../../../i18n' import {Formik, Form, Field} from 'formik' import { BonusIcon, BezopasniyTorgIcon, AdvertisementIcon, TorgIcon, RatingIcon, } from '../elements/icons' import {CustomTab} from "../elements/custom_tab/CustomTab" import {ButtonComponent} from "../elements/button/Button" import {CustomField} from "../elements/custom_field/CustomField" import {requiredValidate} from '../validates/requiredValidate' // Styles import {useStyles} from './useStyle' interface LoginValues { phone: string, password: string } const TabPanel = (props) => { const {children, value, index, ...other} = props return (
{value === index && children}
) }; export const AuthRegPage = (props) => { const {t, language} = props; const initialValues: LoginValues = {phone: '', password: ''}; const [value, setValue] = useState(0); const onSubmit = (values, actions) => { console.log(values) console.log(actions) }; const handleChange = (event, newValue) => { setValue(newValue) }; const classes = useStyles(); return (
{t('auth_reg:bonus')}
{t('auth_reg:safeBuying')}
{t('auth_reg:createAd')}
{t('auth_reg:createAuction')}
{t('auth_reg:rating')}
{t('auth_reg:welcome')} {t('auth_reg:authSite')}
{t('auth_reg:signInTitle')} } id={0} /> {t('auth_reg:signUpTitle')} } id={1} />
{({errors}) => (
{ errors.phone }
{t('auth_reg:enterPassword')}
{t('auth_reg:forgetPassword')}
{t('auth_reg:signIn')}
{`${t('auth_reg:agreement.firstPart')} `} {`${t('auth_reg:agreement.secondPart')} `} {`${t('auth_reg:agreement.thirdPart')} `} {`${t('auth_reg:agreement.fourthPart')}`} {language === 'uz' && ` ${t('auth_reg:agreement.fifthPart')}`}
)}
{t('auth_reg:enterPhone')}
{t('auth_reg:signUp')}
) };
